name: Tiny planet explorers
description:
Tiny planet exporers >Prototype<

=Player movement=  (WD)

=Shoot=  (Leftarrow,  Rightarrow) (only outside the ship)

=Enter ship=  (E)

=Ship movement= (AD) rotates the ship (W) fly towards facing direction (S)
flybackwards from facing direction

=Leave ship= (E) only if overlapping with planets gravity, noticable if camera is scrolling to current planet
